content.rendered:
OUR SERVICES

Spa Treatments

We offer a wide range of treatments for mind, body and spirit rejuvination

01.

Facial Spa Treatments

Restore your radiance with our luxury facial treatments. From anti-aging and firming to hydrating and soothing, we are sure to bring back your glow.

02.

Massage Therapy

A range of massage therapy suitable for clients based on consultation and expressed needs. These can range in time from 30 minutes to 2 hours.

03.

Spa Body Treatments

Body exfoliation, and detoxifying and rehydrating wraps

04.

Bundled Packages

Bundled packages for couples, groups as well as corporate packages.

05.

Manicures & Pedicures

Enjoy instant results with our array of treatments for your hands and feet. Sit back, relax and choose your perfect shade of polish, knowing you are in the safest of hands.

06.

Spa Beauty Treatments

From lash and brow tinting to hair tretments.Anything and everything to have you looking your best.

Have a Look at Our

Amenities

You deserve the best and we offer the best.

Beauty Store

We have a well-stocked beauty store with world renown beauty and wellness products.

Sauna

Our wood infused sauna is available reaching temperatures of up to 80 degrees Celcius.

Nail Bar

Fully fledged nail bar offering pedicures and manicures.

Book Now

Salon

Visit our full beauty salon with talented beauticians for hair , makeup and other services.

Book Now
Special Offer

10% Off full body massages

We are offering 10% off on all our full body massages throughout the month of November

Book an appointment
What Are You Waiting For...

Make An Appointment

Our location

President Hotel Second Floor
BICC, City Center Lilongwe

Opening Hours

Mon - Sunday: 9am-9pm

Contact

Phone:
+265-997-248-883
+265-993-569-645

Hotel extension 20004
Email: umodzispa@gmail.com
